reasoning: Collection of 10 small UI enhancements totaling ~120 lines across 3-5 files. All features use standard React patterns (event handlers, localStorage, refs, clipboard API) with no external dependencies or infrastructure changes. Query history is the most complex feature but still follows common React state management patterns.

scope.notes: Changes concentrated in SearchPage.tsx, LogViewer.tsx, and TimePicker.tsx with possible utility files

integrations.notes: All features use native browser APIs (localStorage, Clipboard API, Blob/URL for downloads) - no external integrations

infrastructure.notes: Pure frontend changes using localStorage for persistence, no backend changes needed

knowledge.notes: All features use standard React patterns: useEffect for auto-focus, onKeyDown for shortcuts, localStorage for persistence, navigator.clipboard for copy, Blob/URL.createObjectURL for CSV export

concerns: Query history might need storage size limits
Keyboard shortcut could conflict with browser defaults
CSV export needs proper escaping for special characters
risk.notes: All additive UI enhancements with no changes to core functionality

validation_recommendations.reasoning: UI-only enhancements in a single service with no auth, API, or database changes. Unit tests sufficient if they exist for affected components. Clipboard and localStorage are browser-sandboxed with no security implications.

simple_features: Auto-focus search input (~5 lines) - useEffect with ref
Keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Enter (~5-10 lines) - onKeyDown handler
Relative time tooltips (~5 lines) - title attribute or Tooltip component
Show execution time (~10 lines) - display existing metric
medium_features: Clear search button (~10 lines) - button with reset handler
Remember time range (~8 lines) - localStorage read/write
Better empty state (~15 lines) - conditional rendering with improved UI
complex_features: Export to CSV (~25 lines) - data transformation + Blob download
Query history dropdown (~30 lines) - localStorage + dropdown UI + state management
